glsa.title: zziplib: Buffer Overflow
glsa.synopsis: The zziplib library contains a buffer overflow vulnerability that could lead to user-assisted remote execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: The zziplib library is a lightweight library for extracting data from files archived in a single zip file.

description.p: dmcox dmcox discovered a boundary error in the zzip_open_shared_io() function from zzip/file.c .

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to run a zziplib function with an overly long string as an argument which would trigger the buffer overflow and may lead to the execution of arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
